title: 4.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
Analyze the model created according to the following cases:
Case 1: Draw the four shapes on a piece of paper and show it in front of the camera to test the model.
Case 2: Test the model with an Oval shape.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
